body_html: Get tensor by name gets a tensor, not a variable object. It would be nice to add a reuse keyword to tf.get_variable so we could grab variables directly. Obviously to avoid subtle bugs it should not be the default behavior.
body_text: Get tensor by name gets a tensor, not a variable object.  It would be nice to add a reuse keyword to tf.get_variable so we could grab variables directly.  Obviously to avoid subtle bugs it should not be the default behavior.
body: Get tensor by name gets a tensor, not a variable object.  It would be nice to add a reuse keyword to tf.get_variable so we could grab variables directly.  Obviously to avoid subtle bugs it should not be the default behavior.
